item.description: MEETING AT THE FORT IN LEBANON, NH.... LEAVE YOUR CAR... PILE IN MINE, CAN TAKE 4. OTHERS VEHICLES IF WE NEED BATHING SUIT, TOWELS.. LUNCH, ( NO GLASS IN YOUR BAGS) WATER SHOES, MONEY, SUNSCREEN, SUNGLASSES.. CHOICE OF EATING OUT ON THE WAY HOME OR BRING OUR DINNERS TO EAT ON THE ROAD... A FUN DAY AT THIS WONDERFUL PARK.... IF A RAINY DAY.. WILL SCHEDULE ANOTHER TIME.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: WATERCOUNTRY water amusement park
